metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4971 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNU wget before 1.18 allows remote servers to write to arbitrary files by redirecting a request from HTTP to a crafted FTP resource.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4971` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.17.1-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wget package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.1-1ubuntu1.1').
